title: 1989년 David MacKey v. Judy's Foods, Inc. 사건
summary: 미국 USA, Federal 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: David MacKey v. Judy's Foods, Inc.. 판결일: 1989-02-10. 법원: Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: David MACKEY, Et Al., Plaintiffs-Appellants, v. JUDY’S FOODS, INC., Et Al., Defendants-Appellees
**판결일**: 1989-02-10
**법원**: Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit
**관할**: USA, Federal

**판사**: Boggs, Contie, Milburn

## 변호인

Thomas P. Malone (argued), Minneapolis, Minn., Raymond G. Prince, Nashville, Tenn., Alan Mark Turk, for plaintiffs-appellants., Tyree B. Harris, Nashville, Tenn., Mark H. Lynch (argued), Covington & Burling, Washington, D.C., for defendants-appel-lees.

## 인용

- 867 F.2d 325

## 판결문 요약

867 F.2d 325
    David MACKEY, et al., Plaintiffs-Appellants,v.JUDY'S FOODS, INC., et al., Defendants-Appellees.
    No. 87-5391.
    United States Court of Appeals,Sixth Circuit.
    Argued July 29, 1988.Decided Feb. 10, 1989.
    
      Thomas P. Malone (argued), Minneapolis, Minn., Raymond G. Prince, Nashville, Tenn., Alan Mark Turk, for plaintiffs-appellants.
      Tyree B. Harris, Nashville, Tenn., Mark H. Lynch (argued), Covington & Burling, Washington, D.C., for defendants-appellees.
      Before:  MILBURN and BOGGS, Circuit Judges;  and CONTIE, Senior Circuit Judge.
      BOGGS, Circuit Judge.
    
    
      1
      Mackey and other franchisees sued franchisors, Judy's Foods and its parent companies, claiming fraud, breach of contract, violation of the Tennessee Consumer Protection Act and intentional infliction of emotional distress.  The district court granted summary judgment for the franchisors based on its determination that the statutes of limitations and a validly executed release signed by the franchisees and Judy's Foods barred all of the claims brought by the franchisees.  654 F. Supp. 1465 (M.D.Tenn.1987).
    
    
      2
      We agree with the district court that all of the franchisees' claims are barred by either the applicable statute of limitations or the release.  Therefore, we affirm the decision granting summary judgment to the franchisors.
    
    
      3
      * Judy's Foods, originally formed by General Care Corporation and later sold to...
